MIDIPort.summary: The MIDIPort interface of the represents a MIDI input or output port.

remarks.para: A MIDIPort instance is created when a new MIDI device is connected. Therefore it has no constructor.

MIDIPortConnection.summary: The connection read-only property of the interface returns the connection state of the port.
MIDIPortConnection.value: Returns a string containing the connection state of the port, one of:

MIDIPortVersion.summary: The version read-only property of the interface returns the version of the port.
MIDIPortVersion.value: A string containing the version of the port.

MIDIPortState.summary: The state read-only property of the interface returns the state of the port.
MIDIPortState.value: A string containing the state of the port, one of:

MIDIPortManufacturer.summary: The manufacturer read-only property of the interface returns the manufacturer of the port.
MIDIPortManufacturer.value: A string containing the manufacturer of the port.

MIDIPortType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface returns the type of the port, indicating whether this is an input or output MIDI port.
MIDIPortType.value: A string containing the type of the port, one of:

MIDIPortStatechange.summary: The statechange event of the interface is fired when a port changes from open to closed, or closed to open.

MIDIPortOpen.summary: The open() method of the interface makes the MIDI device connected to this MIDIPort explicitly available.

remarks.para: If the port is successfully opened a new is queued to the MIDIPort and MIDIAccess events, and the property is changed to "open".
If the port is already open when this method is called, then the promise will resolve successfully.

MIDIPortOpen.returns: A which resolves once access to the port has been successfully obtained.

MIDIPortName.summary: The name read-only property of the interface returns the system name of the port.
MIDIPortName.value: A string containing the system name of the port.

MIDIPortClose.summary: The close() method of the interface makes the access to the MIDI device connected to this MIDIPort unavailable.

remarks.para: If the port is successfully closed a new is queued to the MIDIPort and MIDIAccess events, and the property is changed to "closed".

MIDIPortClose.returns: Returns a which resolves once the port has been closed.

MIDIPortId.summary: The id read-only property of the interface returns the unique ID of the port.
MIDIPortId.value: A string containing an ID for the port.
